Name: Fishing at Lotus Lakes
About the game: This is a leisure and entertainment game that simulates fishing. You can experience the fun of fishing with a simple mouse and keyboard. The lakeside huts are surrounded by mountains, so you can enjoy fishing time comfortably, and you can also browse the beautiful scenery around you. The scoreboard also records the type and value of the fish you catch, so get a good harvest in the game. Instructions: A/S/D/W--walking TAB--Menu Left mouse button-throw fishing rod On the mouse wheel-take-up Under the mouse wheel-take-up
